cu.explanation_en: Setting the AMF IP address to an invalid format '999.999.999.999' will cause network connection failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting the SSB block power to 100 dBm exceeds the maximum allowed value, causing configuration validation failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 SSB 區塊功率設定為 100 dBm 超過允許的最大值，導致配置驗證失敗。
